__e: See, most American men don't know what a man is.
Not only will Americans believe me, they'll cry for me.
Your fellow Americans don't know what's good for them.
You can't be an American, because that's what it's all about and that's the only thing that it's all about! Nothing else.
That is what I want, and that is what the great majority of Americans want. And that is why I want to be president.
I don't want you to think that all Americans are like that.
NEW YORK, 2004 - Americans are... NEW YORK, 2004 - more like that than us.
I can safely say all Americans are in favor of that.
You know, I never know what those Americans are talking about.
And that is that the eyes of all Americans are on you now.
If the Americans stay here I can stay too!
Even better it's not just the American people who know.
[in Arabic] Tell those fucking Americans my brother's blood will not be in vain.
So is he willing to pay us American dollars? Cash?
He's got 295 million Americans to think about, not just these three.
